Svelte Utility

--- The key features are: * **Type Strong ğŸ’ª**: Written in [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), with [TS Docs](https://github.com/microsoft/tsdoc). * **Fast to code ğŸš€**: Increase the speed to develop features by about 200% to 300%. * **Fewer bugs ğŸ**: Reduce about 40% of human (developer) induced errors. * **SSR Friendly ğŸ•º**: Works perfectly with server-side. * **Easy ğŸ’«**: Designed to be easy to use and learn. Less time reading docs. * **Interactive demos ğŸ‰** : Documentation of functions also come with interactive demos!. * **Feature Rich ğŸŒˆ**: 100+ functions for you to choose from. * **Fully ğŸŒ³ shakeable**: Only take what you want. ## Installation ```bash pnpm add -D @sveu/actions ``` ## ğŸ§ª Example ```svelte
